name: Paint Wars - PROLOGUE pt. 2: The Cow, the wrong colors and the PAINT
name_original: Paint Wars - PROLOGUE pt. 2: The Cow, the wrong colors and the PAINT
description:
Paint Wars - PROLOGUE pt. 2: The Cow, the wrong colors and the PAINT is an adventure game developed by LimonGatstaedler. It was originally released in 2018.
Paint Wars - PROLOGUE pt. 2: The Cow, the wrong colors and the PAINT is available on Web. The game is sold via itch.io.
